PageTitle: display qos micro-burst peak-buffer verbose interface
FuncDef: The display qos micro-burst peak-buffer verbose interface command displays the peak buffer usage of an interface and the buffer usage of queues on the interface. The display qos micro-burst peak-buffer verbose interface command displays the peak buffer usage of an interface and the buffer usage of queues on the interface. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
CLIs: display qos micro-burst peak-buffer verbose interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display qos micro-burst peak-buffer verbose interface 10GE 1/0/1
ExtraInfo: You can run the display qos micro-burst peak-buffer verbose interface command to view the peak buffer usage of an interface and the buffer usage of queues on the interface.
